|imdb = http://www.imdb.com/name/nm2181128/|First = "[[Breaker of Chains]]"}}'''Joey Fry''' is a British actor. He portrays [[Hizdahr zo Loraq]] in the [[Season 4|fourth season]].<ref>[http://winteriscoming.net/2013/09/hizdahr-zo-loraq-cast/ Winter Is Coming]</ref>

He is best known for his role as Lu'kibu in the film ''[[wikipedia: 10,000 B.C.| 10,000 B.C.]]''. He has also appeared in TV series such as ''[[wikipedia: Trollied|Trollied]]'' (alongside [[Mark Addy]]) and ''[[wikipedia: Plebs (TV Series)|Plebs]]''.
